dcterms:description: Scan2CAD is a dataset used for learning CAD model alignment in RGB-D scans, providing a benchmark for evaluating CAD model retrieval and alignment methods.

dcterms:description: ScanNet is a richly annotated dataset of 3D reconstructions of indoor scenes, providing a comprehensive benchmark for various tasks in 3D computer vision.

dcterms:description: ARKit is a diverse real-world dataset for 3D indoor scene understanding using mobile RGB-D data, aimed at advancing research in 3D perception.

dcterms:description: 3D-FRONT is a dataset containing 3D furnished rooms with layouts and semantics, designed to facilitate research in 3D scene understanding.

dcterms:description: ShapeNet is an information-rich 3D model repository that provides a large collection of 3D shapes for various applications in computer vision and graphics.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet
